meanings.definition: To divide into sections or categories
meanings.sent1: She compartmentalizes her work tasks to stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The storage unit compartmentalizes items based on size.
meanings.sent3: The way she compartmentalizes her snacks is both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His mind compartmentalizes information like a filing cabinet.
meanings.sent5: Compartmentalizing your thoughts can help reduce stress.

meanings.definition: To separate or isolate different parts or aspects
meanings.sent1: The firewall compartmentalizes the network for security.
meanings.sent2: He compartmentalizes his emotions to deal with stress.
meanings.sent3: The way he compartmentalizes his socks is oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: Her heart compartmentalizes love and fear in separate chambers.
meanings.sent5: Compartmentalizing tasks can make them easier to manage.

meanings.definition: To organize or categorize into distinct units
meanings.sent1: The app compartmentalizes photos by date taken.
meanings.sent2: The teacher compartmentalizes the lesson into different topics.
meanings.sent3: The way he compartmentalizes his music collection is quirky.
meanings.sent4: Her brain compartmentalizes memories like a library catalog.
meanings.sent5: Compartmentalizing expenses can help with budgeting.
